items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for January 29, 2026
items.description: A small-town ghost romance, a secret network of magical bookshops, recipes and rituals for sharing, and more of today's best book deals

items.title: The Fantasy Author Who Just Signed an Unprecedented Adaptation Deal
items.description: A fantasy juggernaut secures the kind of control Rowling and Martin can only dream of. Plus: February new releases and more.

items.title: Read Your Way Into January’s New YA Comics and YA Nonfiction
items.description: From a comic inspired by Armenian mythology to memoirs of contemporary American leaders, check out this month's new YA nonfiction and comics.

items.title: Read Queer Books. Abolish ICE.
items.description: Bid on signed queer books in this auction and you'll be helping to raise money for the organizations helping those affected by ICE raids.

items.title: Romance Tropes for Neurodivergent Readers
items.description: For neurodivergent readers, these small moments of accommodation and understanding can feel just as powerful as grand gestures.
